tool_description: Etsy product API, Cached and Realtime data

api_list.name: product_list_product_list_post
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of products from Etsy based on specified filters.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of products to return.

optional_parameters.name: is_top_rated
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include only top-rated products.

optional_parameters.name: shop_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the shop to filter products from.

optional_parameters.name: is_available
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include only available products.

optional_parameters.name: is_bestseller
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include only bestselling products.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category to filter products by.

optional_parameters.name: favorites
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include products with a specific number of favorites.

optional_parameters.name: is_wholesale
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include only wholesale products.

optional_parameters.name: current_in_cart
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include products currently in the cart.

optional_parameters.name: is_wholesale_only
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include only wholesale-only products.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of products to skip before starting to collect the result set.

optional_parameters.name: is_digital
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include only digital products.

optional_parameters.name: is_active_for_wholesale
optional_parameters.description: Filter to include products active for wholesale.
